gallery.title: U-2 During High-Altitude Flight
gallery.description: Lockhead U-2 aircraft operating at extreme altitude during reconnaissance mission, showing distinctive long-wing profile against clear sky.

gallery.title: U-2 Takeoff Procedure
gallery.description: U-2 aircraft during takeoff with support vehicles and ground crew, demonstrating complex launch procedures required for high-altitude missions.

gallery.title: U-2 Cockpit and Instrument Panel
gallery.description: Detailed view of U-2 cockpit showing flight instruments, controls, and pressure suit interface used by pilots during extreme altitude missions.

gallery.title: U-2 Landing Approach
gallery.description: U-2 aircraft during landing approach with distinctive bicycle landing gear and wingtip outriggers visible, requiring specialized ground crew support.

gallery.title: U-2 in Maintenance Hangar
gallery.description: U-2 aircraft in maintenance hangar showing aircraft structure, revealing internal components and construction details of the high-altitude reconnaissance platform.

gallery.title: U-2 Pilot with Pressure Suit
gallery.description: U-2 pilot wearing full pressure suit required for high-altitude missions, highlighting the extreme conditions faced during reconnaissance flights.
